title: Attitude Adjustments
description: Dr. John Fell, Ph.D. and director of a foundation for a local group of doms, has his own boy now after years of grieving for his lover Rob. It should be perfect. But it's not. With unfit owners, mischievous boys, and a new stepmother who just may be more than he can handle, some attitudes need adjusting. This time it might be Dr. Fell who needs to change and shape up! Can a grumpy dom learn how to handle being happy?
author: Syd McGinley
